.. _module1_input_output_and_data_types:

Module 1: Input/Output and Data Types
=====================================

Input/Output
------------

- Use `input()` to get user input
- Use `print()` to display output
- Formatted strings: f-strings, `format()`

Data Types
----------

- int, float, str, bool
- Dynamic typing
- Type conversions (explicit, implicit)
